sources.name: Source
sources.query: sum(align(1m, min, 1 - align(1m, max, ts(aws.ec2.statuscheckfailed_instance, Region=*))))

sources.name: Source
sources.query: sum(align(1m, min, 1 - align(1m, max, ts(aws.ec2.statuscheckfailed_system, Region=*))))

sources.name: P99
sources.query: percentile(99, align(1m, max, last(15m, ts(aws.ec2.diskwritebytes.maximum and Region=*))))/60

sources.name: Instance Storage
sources.query: sum(align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ec2.disk*ops.sum and Region=*))))/60

charts.name: BYTES PER READ OP  (average over all volumes)

sources.name: bytes/op
sources.query:
sum(align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ebs.volumereadbytes))))
/ 
sum(align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ebs.volumereadops))))

sources.name: disk read ops
sources.query: align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ebs.volumereadops and Region=*))/60)

sources.name: top 10
sources.query: if(top(10, mmax(2h, ${disk read ops})), ${disk read ops})

charts.name: BYTES PER WRITE OP  (average over all volumes)

sources.name: bytes/op
sources.query:
sum(align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ebs.volumewritebytes))))
/ 
sum(align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ebs.volumewriteops))))

sources.name: disk read ops
sources.query: align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ebs.volumewriteops and Region=*))/60)

sources.name: top 10
sources.query: if(top(10, mmax(2h, ${disk read ops})), ${disk read ops})

charts.name: BYTES PER READ OP  (average over all machines)

sources.name: bytes/op
sources.query:
sum(align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ec2.diskreadbytes))))
/ 
sum(align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ec2.diskreadops))))

sources.name: top 10
sources.query: if(top(10, mmax(2h, ${disk read ops})), ${disk read ops})

charts.name: BYTES PER WRITE OP  (average over all machines)

sources.name: bytes/op
sources.query:
sum(align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ec2.diskwritebytes))))
/ 
sum(align(1m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ec2.diskwriteops))))

sources.name: top 10
sources.query: if(top(10, mmax(2h, ${disk read ops})), ${disk read ops})

sources.name: netin
sources.query: align(10m, mean, 8 * last(15m, ts(aws.ec2.networkin and Region=*))/60)

sources.name: cpu
sources.query: align(10m, mean, last(15m, ts(aws.ec2.cpuutilization and Region=*)))
